name: Quick Maze
description:
v0.1

Run in an infinite, procedurally generated maze and get the highest score!

  • Procedurally generated maze every time
  • Global leaderboard
  • Fast paced gameplay
  • Discord status

Note: When choosing a name, please refrain from using any characters such as spaces, commas, etc. Doing otherwise will not upload your score to the leaderboard. (this will be dealt with in the future)
